name: Meet Cute the Game
description:
Meet Cute the GAME.
I made a dating sim themed EP 
https://ddsluggers.bandcamp.com/album/meet-cute
Months later I thought, what if I made a game?
Then I nearly forgot about the game!
It's in a not quite finished state but I'd like people to try to see how far I got ,
just messing around with Tyrannno Builder, some simple tutorials and gimp.  
All the music is by me!
( ddsluggers.com )
